release dates: USA::13 February 2012                            (Idyllwild International Festival of Cinema)

1.title: Gizmo, We're Not in WI Anymore!
1.plot: Jahnna and her dog, Gizmo, move from Wisconsin to Hollywood for her attempt at becoming a famous actress. The film crew documents the outlandish obstacles that take place when the two try to find a place to live.

2.title: What a Cute Little Dog!
2.plot: Due to unfamiliarity with LA traffic, Jahnna and Gizmo arrive late to her meeting with a talent manager. Upon arrival she and another eager girl are informed that there is only one spot left on the roster. Will the sweet Midwestern gal finally get her big break or will she lose her opportunity?

3.title: My, People Come & Go So Quickly Here!
3.plot: Gizmo's manager, Oliver, calls Jahnna to tell her that Gizmo has an audition. Much to her surprise, she also has the opportunity to audition for the role of a dog handler. Will Jahnna be able to dazzle the casting director or will Gizmo outshine her once again?

4.title: Lions and Bears, Oh My!
4.plot: On Jahnna's first day of acting class, she arrives a minute late. To top it off, two caddy girls make fun of her accent and Gizmo. The only thing that brightens her day is when she catches the eye of the class cutie, Tad.

5.title: You Go Away or I'll Bite You Myself!
5.plot: Jahnna can't wait for her first date with Tad but there are two problems: Gizmo can't stand the fella and the nosy neighbor George tries to interfere in her plans. To make matters worse, Oliver calls to inform Jahnna about an audition for Gizmo which forces her to leave during the date. Will Tad and Jahnna have a second date? Or will Gizmo's rising stardom prove too much for them?

6.title: Oh Dear, I Keep Forgetting I'm Not in WI!
6.plot: Jahnna rushes to Gizmo's audition in Vegas with an unexpected tag-a-long, George. After their long day, George decides to try and show them how to have fun in Vegas by inviting a couple friends into their motel room. Will Jahnna and Gizmo survive in the city that never sleeps or will it prove to be too much for a country gal and her pup?

7.title: I'll Fight You with One Paw Tied Behind My Back!
7.plot: It happens! Jahnna goes on her second date with Tad but to her dismay the little man in her life, Gizmo, is not pleased. She is smitten with Tad, but Gizmo is there to constantly remind her that all he does is talk about himself.

8.title: If I Only Had the Nerve!
8.plot: After walking six miles to get home, Jahnna must dash off to another audition for Gizmo. Unfortunately the rent is due but they have not received their paycheck from the Vegas gig. Will it arrive on time or is this the end of their Hollywood dream?

9.title: Shucks Folks, I'm Speechless!
9.plot: Gizmo has made a deal with Jahnna, if she wants him to keep auditioning she has to stop seeing Tad. That is put to the test when Gizmo catches her sneaking out to see Tad's play. Will she work out a new deal with Gizmo or is the damage beyond repair?

10.title: I'll Get You My Pretty, and Your Little Dog Too!
10.plot: The moment she has been waiting for has arrived Jahnna booked her first audition! However a little cloud comes to rain on her parade through Oliver's phone call. It turns out that Gizmo also booked an audition at the same time. She must now decide between her audition or Gizmo's, who will it be?

11.title: There's No Place Like Home!
11.plot: Everything seems to pile up at once: Jahnna gets evicted, Oliver refuses to help her book anything unless it just involves Gizmo, and her mother wants her back in Wisconsin. Will she and Gizmo beat the odd or will Hollywood send them back home to the farm?

1.title: How LA Started
1.plot: See for yourself where the idea of LA started, while getting a close look at an Emmy in person, and follow Gizmo who gets one of his commercial DVDs back to see his acting skills.

2.title: Beverly Hills Chihuahua
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: Santa Photoshoot
3.plot: The holidays are in the air when Gizmo has a Santa Photoshoot with a celebrity photographer which pays for the two actors to finally get cable TV in their home and after the shoot they both head to Jahnna's holiday party hosted by her commercial agent located on Sunset Blvd.

4.title: A Christmas Special
4.plot: Is it that time of year, come along to see Gizmo and Jahnna celebrating Christmas in Los Angeles before packing to go to the colder Midwest.

5.title: Thanks for Bringing Me Home
5.plot: Spend the Holidays with Jahnna and Gizmo where they travel from Los Angeles to Minneapolis to celebrate Christmas and even road trip to Green Bay to applaud the Packer spirit, go pack go! This episode dedicated to Grandpa Dec 27th 1934 - Dec 22nd 2011.

6.title: January Birthdays
6.plot: Is it possible to be in two places at once, in different climates, while celebrating two birthdays? Join Jahnna and Gizmo ice skating in Wisconsin with 11 degree weather while eating sushi in beautiful sunny California.

7.title: Off to the Beach
7.plot: After being in the cold Midwest for the Holidays, Gizmo and Jahnna decide to head to the beach to soak up the weather. Following a beautiful day, it's time to do some acting with a table read from a short film.

8.title: Hollywood Sign & Walk of Fame
8.plot: Explore California along side Gizmo and Jahnna while checking out the known Griffith Observatory, climb to the Hollywood Sign, and take a stroll on the Walk of Fame, all in one day.

9.title: Dorothy and Toto Photoshoot
9.plot: Jahnna and Gizmo prepare for a Dorothy and Toto photoshoot. The two need to find a picnic basket but are not having much luck; will they find their prop before the shoot or go empty handed?

10.title: Day of Fun
10.plot: Jahnna & Gizmo take a break from the Hollywood industry to have some fun on the west side with jumping into the pacific ocean, going out with friends, and topping the night off by eating food at one of Gizmo's favorite places on Sunset Blvd.

imdb.plot outline: 2Fur1 Season 2 is a comedy mockumentary where a film crew follows two best friends, a girl and her talking dog, to Hollywood California. The star struck girl can't catch her big break while her dog seems to be making his mark. The dog lands every acting audition and pays their bills even though he wants nothing to do with the industry. Will their friendship stay strong or will the dog end up stealing the show? 2Fur1 Season 1 follows Jahnna and Gizmo around in California in a reality style show. A one person crew (filmed by Jahnna). A day in the life style series. Season 2 takes the idea from season 1 but is fully scripted. A full cast and crew! And Gizmo the Chihuahua even talks in season 2!
imdb.title: 2Fur1
